agb.title: Terms and Conditions
agb.s1_text: These General Terms and Conditions (GTC) apply to all contracts between ARIIA GmbH (i.G.), Musterstraße 1, 10115 Berlin (hereinafter referred to as "Provider") and the customer (hereinafter referred to as "Customer") regarding the use of the ARIIA platform as Software-as-a-Service (SaaS).
agb.s2_text: The provider provides the customer with the ARIIA platform, an AI-supported solution for automated customer communication via various channels.
agb.s3_title: § 3 Conclusion of contract and test phase
agb.s3_text: The contract is concluded by the registration of the customer on the website and the confirmation by the provider. Every new customer receives a free trial phase of 14 days.
agb.s4_text: The current prices can be found on the provider's website. All prices are subject to the statutory value-added tax.
agb.s5_text: For monthly billing, the minimum term is one month. For annual billing, the minimum term is one year.
agb.s6_text: The provider strives for an availability of the platform of 99.9% on annual average.
agb.s7_text: The provider processes personal data of the customer and its end customers exclusively within the framework of the applicable data protection laws, in particular the GDPR.
agb.s8_text: The provider is liable without limitation for intent and gross negligence.
agb.s9_text: The law of the Federal Republic of Germany applies, excluding the UN Convention on Contracts for the International Sale of Goods.

privacy.s8_text: This privacy policy is currently valid as of February 2026.
